long_description: With midweight 200g fleece liners, the Black Diamond Torrent Gloves are warm, 4-season mountaineering gloves designed to endure cold approaches and harsh weather. 100% waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX insert with XCR product technology stays with the shell and guarantees that your hands stay dry. Abrasion-resistant woven nylon shells combine 2-way and 4-way stretch for great comfort and dexterity. 200g removable fleece liners. Black Diamond Torrent Gloves have goat leather palms for good grip. Closeout.
